title: Authors and Citation
text: Barbone J (2023). echo: Log R Evaluations. https://github.com/jmbarbone/echo, https://jmbarbone.github.io/echo/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {echo: Log R Evaluations},   author = {Jordan Mark Barbone},   year = {2023},   note = {https://github.com/jmbarbone/echo, https://jmbarbone.github.io/echo/}, }

title: Log R Evaluations
text: goal echo provide function evaluating logging script.

title: Log R Evaluations
text: can install development version echo like :

title: Echo — echo
code: echo(   exprs,   log = echo_get_log(),   msg = echo_get_msg(),   level = echo_get_level(),   file = NULL )

title: Echo — echo
text: exprs Expressions evaluate. log connection file name outputs; defaults stdout() msg Logical, FALSE output message; defaults TRUE level Sets echo level (see details); defaults 0L file File path evaluate (like base::source()).  file NULL, exprs must missing.

title: Echo — echo
text: Levels output can controlled level: 0 EXP: logs expressions evaluated 1 : logs outputs expressions 2 MSG: logs messages 3 WRN: logs warnings 4 ERR: logs errors set, outputs level run. Errors always logged interrupt stop program.
